${ModID}:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
DESCRIPTIONS: At #b%s or more stacks, double the damage of the next Attack and 失去 #b%s stacks。

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当 一张牌 is #y消耗ed or #yAmplified, 获得 #b%s #yCharge #yUp。

${ModID}:EarthlightRay.NAME: Earthlight Ray
DESCRIPTIONS: After you 获得 #yCharge #yUp, deal damage equal to its total to ALL enemies。
After you 获得 #yCharge #yUp, deal damage equal to its total times #b%s to ALL enemies。

${ModID}:BuildingCharge.NAME: Building Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当 you play 一张牌 本回合, 获得 #b%s #yCharge #yUp。
